Text: Joint Strategic Sourcing Action Items Updateeverybody The date of our next meeting is approaching fast and I wanted to make sure that we have not forgot about the action items that need to happen before January th Please let me know your specific plan and target dates by which each action item will be accomplished It is very important that we stay on schedule I will do my best to help any of you make things happen by January th Regards Rositza Smilenova Supply Specialist Forwarded by Rositza SmilenovaNAEnron on PM Rositza Smilenova PM To Craig H nron Michael nron Roy nron Tracy CT Rositza NRON John NRON Shirley Jo NRON Jennifer nron Heidi nron Lisa NRON cc Subject Joint Strategic Sourcing Meeting Notes Please find attached the notes from our recent meeting I will appreciate if we can attach specific dates to all of the action items Thank you for the participation Thanks Rositza Smilenova Supply Specialist

ETS Operations companies P and Cc Tracy and James Elaine and Phil thought it would be nice to include this summary page in the plan review package for Stans review next week I think Rod mentioned that Stan has set a target for Phil of MM for Please advise if this is still valid because Phil personally has not heard that from Stan The numbers that we have in Adaytum match the MM net contribution The remaining MM are salary offsets on NNG P does not have employees and they use NNG employees When they do that NNg charges the salaries of the employees for the applicable of hours to P Therefore P covers expenses that NNG would have to bear otherwise Phil feels that the MM of salaries offsets should be counted toward the target since its a benefit that P brings to NNG James and I talked about this on the phone Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns Thanks Rositza
